description:
A unique course to learn Microsoft Word very fast, easy and effective.

This Course can guide the academic men, how to prepare their articles in less than 90 minutes. Also this course is useful for who is going to learn fast whatever needs without a lot of explanation and wasting time.

In this series …

  • You will learn how to set up your page, make titles and subtitles and design it.
  • You will also understand the paragraph setting and using bullets and numbering in the easiest method.
  • You will know how to insert and edit a picture in a way that makes your text more beautiful and organized.
  • You will learn how to use symbols and draw tables and write formulas based on your needs.
  • You will know some small but useful details about footnotes and abbreviations and many other things.

By the end of this course, you will be a professional user of Microsoft word.

This 90 –minute course can open new doors to your future success.

So enjoy it!
title: Word in Education:Save time and organize your term paper
